description: The National Research Council of Canada requires the services of a Contractor to assist with the development of the organization’s pay equity plan. The Contractor must customize their proprietary Value of Work (VOW) tool, methodology, and approach to fit the context of NRC and its workforce.
tags: Services auxiliary to finance and insurance
full_summary:
========================================
### TSPS Solutions Stream 1: Human Resources Services

#### Solicitation Details

| Solicitation ID    | Solicitation Reference ID  |
| :----------------- | :-------------------------- |
| 23-58257          | CB-445-35943237            |

#### Notice Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Publication Date**: March 5, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 21, 2024 at 2:00 pm EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 3, 2024

#### Tender Description

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) invites your proposal to provide human resources services, specifically to assist in the development of the organization's pay equity plan. The successful contractor will be required to customize their proprietary Value of Work (VOW) tool, methodology, and approach to suit the context of NRC and its workforce.

#### Evaluation Criteria

* Technical Merit (50%)
* Price (40%)
* Other Considerations (10%)

#### Contact Information

* **Contract Manager**: Annette Driscoll
* **Email**: [annette.driscoll@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:annette.driscoll@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (506) 377-9104
* **Address**: 100 Rue de la Francophonie, Moncton, NB E1C 5A6

#### Documents

* [Human Resources Services Tender Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33466/23-58257_npp_human-resources-services.pdf)
* [Human Resources Services Tender Revision](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33466/23-58257_npp_human-resources-services_revision_march-6-2024.pdf)
